OOC: that was moding, you can only fire 2 missiles, I'll ignore it...

Sent: Saturday, September 02, 2000 8:26 PM
Subject: Re: Go ahead punk make my day.


>
> ::Dollen::
>
>           Dollen got hit by all 8 shots from Blender and Stronghold.  He
> flew back but got up again.  Suddenly, he saw GoldenEye being hit, and not
> retreating, still going after Deemos.  What was she doing?????  They
> couldn't afford to lose a Predacon.  He couldn't afford to lose someone
whom
> he cared for deeply.  He didn't know what to do.  Then, it hit him again.
> Another image of the bot, the beautiful bot.  Danger....Still
> danger.....Then it told him.  Dollen looked at GoldenEye, going towards
> Deemos.  Yes, she was strong, she could make it.  He had faith in her.  He
> had to let her be, to make her own choice.  He saw Blender dragging
> Stronghold and Diskus.  Then he saw Airbomber, Infectra and Time Warp, and
> Zava come along.  OH NO!!!!!!  THESE MAXIMALS AND CHOSEN ONES WERE FUCKIN
> ASS LUNATICS!!!!!!!(Please excuse my anger in its own language)  Dollen
> couldn't take it any more, he wipped out his missile gun, fired 1 missile
at
> Deemos, 1 missile at Blender, 1 missile at Airbomber and 1 missile at
Zava,
> screaming in rage.
>
>
>
>
